org.apache.flink.api.java.record.operators

Class ReduceOperator.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.java.record.operators.ReduceOperator.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    ReduceOperator

    public static class ReduceOperator.Builder
extends Object
    Builder pattern, straight from Joshua Bloch's Effective Java (2nd Edition).
